definition: omen/sign (that sth is about to happen)/warning sign
omen/sign (of sth yet to occur)/prior indication/to foreshadow
megabyte (2^20 or approximately a million bytes)

sentences.chinese: 把泵壓保持在20兆帕以下。

sentences.english: I'm going to upgrade the 128M Bytes of memory to 256M Bytes.
sentences.chinese: 我打算把128兆內存升級到256兆。

sentences.english: I'm going to upgrade the 128M Bytes of memory to 256M Bytes.
sentences.chinese: 我打算把128兆內存升級到256兆。

sentences.english: At standard rate, seventeen trillion units per second.
sentences.chinese: 標準量級，每秒十七兆單位。

sentences.english: Megasonics are currently used mainly in the silicon industry.
sentences.chinese: 兆聲波目前主要應用於半導體行業。

sentences.english: Dameras in the 2-megapixel range can make very good standard prints.
sentences.chinese: 在2兆像素規模內的相機能做出大好的標準印製相片。

sentences.english: The buffer size can be specified in bytes or megabytes.
sentences.chinese: 可以按字節或兆字節來指定緩衝區的大小。

sentences.english: And the sign flashed out its warning in the words that it was forming.
sentences.chinese: 霓虹燈突然閃爍出警兆，警告的語句漸漸成型。

sentences.english: A blustering night, a fair day.
These devices continually pass megabytes of data every second from the capture card to the display.
sentences.chinese: 這些設備每秒從採集卡到顯示端傳遞兆字節數據流。

sentences.english: The computer has a 128M of memory.
sentences.chinese: 這臺計算機有一個儲量爲128兆的內存。

sentences.english: Euro-area nations have set up a bailout fund of about one trillion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 歐元區國家成立了大約1兆美元的救援基金。

sentences.english: The rated working pressure of the separator is 10 MPa.
sentences.chinese: 分離器的額定工作壓力是10兆帕。

sentences.english: The internal stress of the joined materials was only several MPa according to the result of calculation.
sentences.chinese: 應力計算結果得出焊接件中只有數兆帕的拉應力。

sentences.english: If you go down to 1s, it's 20 MJ per mole.
sentences.chinese: 如果再往下看1s層，是一摩爾20兆焦耳。

sentences.english: Apple developed the G4 chip that runs at 500 megahertz.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果電腦開發出G4芯片，其運行速度是500兆。

definition: to lean over/to fall (go down)/to hide (in ambush)/to conceal oneself/to lie low/hottest days of summer/to submit/to concede defeat/to overcome/to subdue/volt
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
